timestamp.description: The time that the revision was saved in YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ format.

page.description: Metadata about the page the revision was saved to

title.description: The page's full name (including namespace prefix)

redirect.description: Redirected to page name.  Otherwise, null.

restrictions.description: The protection restrictions applied to this page.

user.description: Metadata about the user who saved the edit.  Might be null if the contributor information was deleted.

text.description: The user's user_name if registered or the IP address if anon.

comment.description: The revision summary.  Might be null if the summary was deleted.

text.description: The content of the revision.  Might be null if the revision content was deleted.

bytes.description: The size of revision content in bytes

sha1.description: A sha1 hash of the revision content

parent_id.description: The revision ID of the preceding revision

deleted.description: Represents information about the deleted/suppressed status of a revision and itâ€™s associated data.

text.description: Is the text of this revision deleted/suppressed?

comment.description: Is the comment of this revision deleted/suppressed?

user.description: Is the user of this revision deleted/suppressed?

data.text: This is an example revision text.

tests.description: llama-70b generated negative; focus on type keyword with an array of types
tests.python_error:
12345 is not of type 'object', 'null'

Failed validating 'type' in schema['properties']['user']:
    {'description': 'Metadata about the user who saved the edit.  Might be '
                    'null if the contributor information was deleted.',
     'type': ['object', 'null'],
     'properties': {'id': {'description': "The users's identifier if "
                                          'registered',
                           'type': 'number'},
                    'text': {'description': "The user's user_name if "
                                            'registered or the IP address '
                                            'if anon.',
                             'type': 'string'}}}

On instance['user']:
    12345
